channel.title: Exception in thread
channel.description:
Hey, the title of this probably put you off reading this thread. But, I have recently added a couple of new items. I am 99.99% sure that I have done everything correctly. But, this is what I get when I run my server.
[code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 6 at ItemHandler.loadItemList(ItemHandler.java:283) at ItemHandler.<init>(ItemHandler.java:173) at server.main(server.java:116) [/code]
I have another question, what will happen if this error goes unfixed? Like, will I not be able to edit my source until it is resolved?
The files I have edited were Item.cfg, my models folder, Class8.java and Client.java.
Thank you for any help at all. And please don't ask me to remove what I have added.
Thanks. ~~ 14-08

item.title: Exception in thread
item.description:
@14-08 wrote:

Okay, thanks a lot.

It is fixed now. I really do appreciate this help.

 ~~ 14-08

Read full topic

item.title: Exception in thread
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

somewhere in ur item.cfg u messed up
perhaps an extra space with a tab
like
999TABspace999
check around the last things u edited in the file

Read full topic
